Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory39.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The data's correct. This warning call was from Liv's comms.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I see... I don't recommend going forward. We should immediately retreat and locate Liv, and wait for reinforcement.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As you discuss among yourselves how best to retreat, one mechanoid guard with only its skeleton frame left stands up and drags its broken body before you all.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'The rest of you must be Constructs from Babylonia. I am gratefulâ€”you two have helped me improve on the defense of the Golden Vortex.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I-is this a trap?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'This mechanoid should have a projection device, if I recall correctly...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Here! Now you can all see me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'I have been watching you since you entered this desert.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'I am Nat, Queen of Gold, the Golden Construct, the Nemesis of the Punishing Virus, She who is the Last Hope of Earth.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee... make sure there's no one ambushing us. Give me the clear, and we're out of here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Are you worrying about Liv? I can take you to see her.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Let me establish that I do not "have" Liv with me. But with a snap of my finger, and my servants will destroy her as they would have devour you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As soon as Nat finishes speaking, all the mechanoids that can still move begin to make their way toward you, even if they only have one arm left.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'I suggest you reconsider my offer, and whether you can afford the alternative.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why do you want to see us?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Not at all! I only want to see your commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You can't hurt my teammates if you want to see me!", 3: '40'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'I am a Queen of her word.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'My servants will lead the way.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'From what she said, Liv should be fine for now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We have to do what she says for now.', 4: '1'}
